message.text:
More kissing.

This is what the world and my lips need.

Yours with Carmexxxxxx,

Dear Hopeless Romantic,

Everyone gets one kiss in their lifetime that they'll never forget!

This isn't it, but enjoy it anyway!

I was just thinking about you and I decided that you deserve a Carmex kiss—can you feel the tingle?

I better get one back,

You are the cheese to my mac, the jelly to my peanut butter, the Luigi to my Mario, and the shake to my bake. Some things just go together…like tingles and kisses.

Love,
